headline: Millrose Properties (MRP) Announces First Quarterly Dividend after Spin-off
summary: Millrose Properties, Inc. (NYSE:MRP) is one of the 15 successful spin-off companies. On June 16, the company’s board of directors approved a cash quarterly dividend of $0.69 per share for Class A and Class B common stock. The dividend offering is to be paid on July 15 to shareholders of record as of July 3, […]
